lead_paragraph: Bigger than ever, the European Championship kicks off in Paris on Friday with a four-week feast of soccer that promises to elevate the game above the corruption scandals and security fears that have overshadowed its build-up.

headline.print_headline: Spotlight Back on the Soccer Pitch for Expanded Euros
headline.main: Spotlight Back on the Soccer Pitch for Expanded Euros
